title: [PernilleCarry]
body:
a while ago i created a account for my sister that she could play on but we have forgotten the password and can´t find the email
and the summoner name is PernilleCarry and im not sure if its safe to say her login name here but we just want the email so we can figure this out

-Tokicarry 
pls help us

replies.body: You'll need to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to verify that you're the creator of the account and then help you get back in ^_^!
